name: Watermelon-Mint Lemonade
description: Blended watermelons provide most of the liquid for this light and refreshing lemonade.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup fresh juice from 10 to 12 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Place watermelon, lemon juice, sugar, and salt in a blender and blend on high speed until smooth, about 1 minute. Strain through a fine mesh strainer into 1-quart liquid measuring cup. Add cold water to equal 1 quart.
Place mint in the botton of a pitcher and muddle lightly with a wooden spoon. Add watermelon mixture and stir to combine. Add ice. Serve immediately in ice-filled glasses garnished with mint sprigs.
